Description of incident: "A Channel 9 viewer said she warned Charlotte-Mecklenburg Schools’ officials after finding documents with students’ names, addresses and other personal information blowing in the wind.But when Channel 9 arrived to the area near Johnston-Oehler Road in north Charlotte, the documents were still there. The unshredded documents are from Mallard Creek High School and contained disciplinary actions and names of students.One woman, who didn't want to be identified, found the papers Friday morning and was shocked."My biggest concern was someone stealing a child's information and someone targeting that child," she said. "I was reading parents' information, notes from kids who were bringing doctor's notes to school."
